title: Getting Started with overturemapsr
text: overturemapsr R package provides access Overture Maps open data. package, can access 2.3 billion building footprints, 52.6 million points interest, features made available Overture Maps.

title: Getting Started with overturemapsr
text: can install development version overturemapsr GitHub

title: Getting Started with overturemapsr
text: Start loading overturemapsr package:

title: Getting Started with overturemapsr
text: can view available themes using get_all_overture_schema_types() function: return:
code: # Get all available overture types themes <- get_all_overture_schema_types() print(themes) [1] "locality"                "locality_area"           "administrative_boundary" [4] "building"                "building_part"           "division"                [7] "division_area"           "place"                   "segment"                 [10] "connector"               "infrastructure"          "land"                    [13] "land_cover"              "land_use"                "water"

title: Getting Started with overturemapsr
text: access datasets provided Overture Maps, use arrow::open_dataset() function along dataset_path function. can access explore building footprints points interest datasets without loading memory.

title: Getting Started with overturemapsr
code: # Access the building dataset building_dataset <- open_dataset(dataset_path('building'))  # Get the number of rows in the building dataset nrow(building_dataset) [1] 2355192722

title: Getting Started with overturemapsr
text: Using place theme, can fetch point interests.
code: # Access the place dataset places_dataset <- open_dataset(dataset_path('place'))  # Get the number of rows in the place dataset nrow(places_dataset) [1] 52622149

title: Getting Started with overturemapsr
text: limit size dataset processing time, can use bounding boxes. especially useful dealing large datasets. example use bounding box record_batch_reader() function convert parquet file data frame use: Result:
code: # Example bounding box sf_bbox <- c(-122.5, 37.7, -122.3, 37.8)  # Retrieve filtered dataset based on the bounding box result <- record_batch_reader(schema_type = 'place', bbox = sf_bbox) # A tibble: 6 × 15   id                                           geometry bbox$xmin $xmax $ymin $ymax version update_time                                                                sources names$primary    categories$main confidence websites socials emails phones       dataset   : > <chr>            <chr>                <dbl> <list<c> <list<> <list> <list> <chr>           <list<   1 08f2830940592b5e034cef17a0ea78ce (-122.4964 37.70068)     -122. -122.  37.7  37.7       0 2024-05-10T00:00:00.000Z                                                   [1 × 4] Palo -Mar Stabl… active_life          0.363      [1]     [1]           [1] NA               [1 × 5] 2 08f28309462d847503a8e8da827c2bca  (-122.494 37.70005)     -122. -122.  37.7  37.7       0 2024-05-10T00:00:00.000Z                                                   [6 × 4] Gelardi Tax Ser… tax_services         0.77       [1]                   [1] NA               [1 × 5] 3 08f283094290a29e03cfbf6f434fee90 (-122.4918 37.70196)     -122. -122.  37.7  37.7       0 2024-05-10T00:00:00.000Z                                                   [1 × 4] CorgiLand        pet_services         0.270              [1]               NA               [1 × 5] 4 08f2830942902400033849542bf6efe8 (-122.4905 37.70099)     -122. -122.  37.7  37.7       0 2024-05-10T00:00:00.000Z                                                   [1 × 4] Ruff 'n Ready L… pet_services         0.319      [1]     [1]           [1] NA               [1 × 5] 5 08f2830942914d12033d68719b44ca5c (-122.4889 37.70062)     -122. -122.  37.7  37.7       0 2024-05-10T00:00:00.000Z                                                   [1 × 4] Pleiades         professional_s…      0.319      [1]     [1]           [1] NA               [1 × 5]

title: Getting Started with overturemapsr
text: overturemapsr package powerful tool accessing working Overture Maps open data R. provides straightforward way download manipulate large geospatial datasets. features like bounding box filtering, can efficiently manage analyze data relevant area interest.

title: Getting Started with overturemapsr
text: Bounding Box Tool Klokantech: Use tool find specify bounding boxes interest data queries.

what: Download Overture Maps Data in R
title: Download Overture Maps Data in R
text: package provides functions interact OvertureMaps datasets. includes utilities fetching data S3 converting sf objects spatial analysis. Overture Maps provides free open geospatial map data, many different sources normalized common schema. tool helps download Overture data within region interest converts different file formats.

title: Download Overture Maps Data in R
text: install package, need necessary dependencies installed. can install package using following commands:

title: Download Overture Maps Data in R

text: basic example shows solve common problem: ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.

title: Download Overture Maps Data in R
code: library(arrow) #>  #> Attaching package: 'arrow' #> The following object is masked from 'package:utils': #>  #>     timestamp library(dplyr) #>  #> Attaching package: 'dplyr' #> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from 'package:base': #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(sf) #> Linking to GEOS 3.12.1, GDAL 3.8.4, PROJ 9.3.1; sf_use_s2() is TRUE library(overturemapsr)  # Bounding box of lisbon city ls_bbox <- c(-9.181056,38.696137,-9.095569,38.750243)  # Fetching overture building data ls_building <- record_batch_reader('building', bbox = ls_bbox)

title: Download Overture Maps Data in R
text: get_all_overture_schema_types: function returns available OvertureMaps theme types. dataset_path: function returns S3 path specified Overture dataset type. record_batch_reader: function retrieves filtered dataset specified Overture dataset type, optionally within bounding box, converts sf object.

title: Download Overture Maps Data in R
text: schema_type: Character. Required. type feature select. Examples include ‘building’, ‘place’, etc. learn , run get_all_overture_schema_types(). release_date: Character. Optional. dataset release date (format: ‘YYYY-MM-DD’). Defaults latest available release ‘2025-01-22’ - https://docs.overturemaps.org/release/latest/ bbox: Numeric vector. Optional. bounding box specified c(xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax). recommended use bounding box limit dataset size processing time. Without bounding box, processing entire dataset (e.g., buildings 2 billion) can time-consuming. Bounding Box Tool Klokantech: Use tool find specify bounding boxes interest data queries.

title: Download Overture Maps Data in R
text: package inspired based OvertureMaps Python Repository. functionality similar ensure make package stay updated.

title: Download Overture Maps Data in R

title: dataset_path — dataset_path
text: function returns S3 path specified Overture dataset schema type.

title: dataset_path — dataset_path
text: schema_type Character. Required. type feature select. Examples include 'building', 'place', etc. learn , run get_all_overture_schema_types(). release_date Character. Optional. dataset release date (format: 'YYYY-MM-DD'). Defaults latest available release.

title: dataset_path — dataset_path
text: Character. S3 path bucket data stored.

title: dataset_path — dataset_path
code: # Example usage path <- dataset_path('place', release_date = '2025-01-22') #> Error in dataset_path("place", release_date = "2025-01-22"): unused argument (release_date = "2025-01-22") print(path) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'path' not found

title: get_all_overture_types — get_all_overture_schema_types

title: get_dataset_metadata — get_dataset_metadata
text: function retrieves metadata information given dataset type.

title: get_dataset_metadata — get_dataset_metadata
text: schema_type Character. Required. type feature select. release_date Character. Optional. dataset release date (format: 'YYYY-MM-DD').

title: get_dataset_metadata — get_dataset_metadata
text: list containing metadata column names dataset size.

title: get_dataset_metadata — get_dataset_metadata
code: # \donttest{ metadata <- get_dataset_metadata('place', release_date = '2025-01-22') #> Error in get_dataset_metadata("place", release_date = "2025-01-22"): could not find function "get_dataset_metadata" print(metadata) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'metadata' not found # }

title: record_batch_reader — record_batch_reader
text: function retrieves filtered dataset specified Overture dataset type, optionally within bounding box, converts sf object.

title: record_batch_reader — record_batch_reader
text: schema_type Character. Required. type feature select. Examples include 'building', 'place', etc. learn , run get_all_overture_schema_types(). bbox Numeric vector. Optional. bounding box specified c(xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax). recommended use bounding box limit dataset size processing time. Without bounding box, processing entire dataset (e.g., buildings 2 billion) can time-consuming. release_date Character. Optional. dataset release date (format: 'YYYY-MM-DD'). Defaults latest available release.

title: record_batch_reader — record_batch_reader
text: sf object containing filtered dataset based bounding box.

title: record_batch_reader — record_batch_reader
code: # \donttest{ # Example usage with a bounding box takes > 20 secs sf_bbox <- c(-122.5, 37.7, -122.3, 37.8) result <- record_batch_reader(schema_type = 'place', bbox = sf_bbox) #> Error in record_batch_reader(schema_type = "place", bbox = sf_bbox): unused argument (schema_type = "place") print(result) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'result' not found # }

title: overturemapsr 0.1.0
text: Added dynamic release date selection metadata retrieval datasets.

title: overturemapsr 0.1.0
text: Users can now specify dataset release dates fetch metadata (e.g., column names, row counts) loading data. Improved handling place data type prevent geometry-related errors.

title: overturemapsr 0.1.0
text: Added progress bar processing time display better user feedback. Optimized dataset retrieval logic faster performance.

title: overturemapsr 0.1.0
text: Thank users contributors feedback support!
